name: Housing & Homelessness Prevention
description: MNC’s Homelessness Prevention program works to identify, assist and provide services to households at the highest risk of losing their housing, by preventing or quickly ending their homelessness. This includes very low and extremely low-income households, and those with leases or informal housing situations.
fullDescription: MNC’s Homelessness Prevention program works to identify, assist and provide services to households at the highest risk of losing their housing, by preventing or quickly ending their homelessness. This includes very low and extremely low-income households, and those with leases or informal housing situations.
whatTheyOffer: MNC’s Homelessness Prevention program works to identify, assist and provide services to households at the highest risk of losing their housing, by preventing or quickly ending their homelessness. This includes very low and extremely low-income households, and those with leases or informal housing situations.
howToGetIt: Call (415) 653-5701 or send email to service email.
keywords: i am experiencing homelessness (on the street, couchsurfing, or other) and i need long-term housing assistance.
